recipes.name: Paneer Butter Masala
recipes.instructions: Cook tomatoes and spices. Blend into gravy. Add paneer and cream. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Veg Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: Fry vegetables, add cooked rice and sauces, mix well on high flame.

recipes.name: Rava Kesari
recipes.instructions: Roast rava, add boiling water and sugar. Stir with ghee until thick.
